Actions.Name: WhoAmI
Actions.Description: Returns information about the currently used API Key and assoicated Service

Actions.Name: Attach DocumentJob to email
Actions.Description: Attach the file generated by a DocumentJob as attachment to a Dynamics 365 email

Actions.Name: Attach DocumentJob as note
Actions.Description: Attach the file generated by a DocumentJob as a note to a Dynamics 365 entity. Attention! The documentjob must already be finished

Actions.Name: Attach file to email
Actions.Description: Attach the file supplied as base64 string as attachment to a Dynamics 365 email

Actions.Name: Attach file as note
Actions.Description: Attach the file supplied as base64 string as a note to a Dynamics 365 entity. Attention! The documentjob must already be finished

Actions.Name: Concatenate two Document Jobs
Actions.Description: Concatenate two files (pdf,docx) generated by two document jobs

Actions.Name: Concatenate two Files (pdf,docx)
Actions.Description: Concatenates two supplied files (pdf,docx)

Actions.Name: Create Document Job (sync)
Actions.Description: This function creates a new document job and waits for the result for up to [TimeOut] seconds

Actions.Name: Create Document Job (async)
Actions.Description: This function creates a new document job.. Attention! The function does NOT wait for a result

Actions.Name: Create Document Job based on an XML (sync)
Actions.Description: This function creates a new document job and waits for the result for up to [TimeOut] seconds

Actions.Name: Create Document Job based on an XML (async)
Actions.Description: This function creates a new document job. Attention! The function does NOT wait for a result

Actions.Name: Get DocumentJob Result
Actions.Description: Retrieves a DocumentJobs status information. The result will include the result document, if the job is finished

Actions.Name: Get DocumentJob Status
Actions.Description: Retrieves the status of a DocumentJob. Dynamics 365 state/statuscode rules apply

Actions.Name: Get Templates
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of available DocumentsCorePack Templates

Actions.Name: Get DCP CombineTypes for DocumentConcatenation
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of supported CombineTypes for DocumentsCorePack

Actions.Name: Get Concatenation ResultTypes
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of supported ResultTypes for Concatenation

Actions.Name: Available DCP Actions
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of supported actions for DocumentsCorePack

Actions.Name: Retrieve EntityNames with annotation capability
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of all Dynamics 365 entities, that support annotations

Actions.Name: Get DCP FileTypes
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of supported filetype for DocumentsCorePack

Actions.Name: Get DCP Printer
Actions.Description: Retrieve available printer names, optionally filtered by user

Actions.Name: Get Single Template
Actions.Description: This function returns the first of the filtered DocumentsCorePack Templates

Actions.Name: Get a list of dynamics users
Actions.Description: list of dynamics users

Actions.Name: Get DCP FileTypes for XmlBased generation
Actions.Description: This function returns a list of supported filetype for DocumentsCorePack XmlBased generation

Actions.Name: IsServiceAlive
Actions.Description: returns true, if the service has been responsive recently, false, if not.

Actions.Name: Check API Availibility
Actions.Description: Verifies, that the API endpoint is currently accessible. Does not require API Key

Actions.Name: Print DocumentJob
Actions.Description: Print a Document generated by a DocumentJob. Attention! The documentjob must already be finished

Actions.Name: Print File
Actions.Description: Prints a file supplied as base64 encoded string. Supported file-formats are PDF and DOCX

Actions.Name: Send email
Actions.Description: Send the specified email
